abstract: Editorial expresses hope that nomination of Joseph Lhota to head Metropolitan Transportation Authority and of Patrick Foye to run Port Authority of New York and New Jersey means that New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is ready to get in the game of meeting complex challenges facing both agencies.
snippet: We hope Governor Cuomo is finally taking interest in the challenges facing the M.T.A. and the Port Authority.
